description:
Add a layer of wicking warmth to your mountain activities. Movement-mirroring stretch and raglan sleeves allow for full range of motion. Wear it by itself on warmer days or as a mid-layer when the temperature drops.

  • Wicking polyester blend has plenty of stretch for freedom of movement
  • Thermo-regulating ActiveTemp™ technology keeps you dry and comfortable
  • 3-panel hood with ponytail port fits close to the head
  • Integrated balaclava provides coverage on chilly adventures
  • Zippered hand pockets, chest pocket and hidden pocket at right hip for essentials
  • Flat lock seams and raglan sleeves for comfort while wearing a backpack
  • Fabric has UPF 30+ sun protection
name: Outdoor Research Vigor Grid Fleece Pullover Hoodie - Women's
